reviewText: Dissappointing by the standards set before. There have been fewer topics which have been given extended time on each episode. The Flight Attendants School was a cheap fill in with no real substance, Hanger Flying another "what to do next" bit a waste of viewers time-arguing who owns the best aircraft, and 100 Years of Commercial Flight was just a re-hash of an overdone topic covered by other series. This item appears on the box on the wrong disc. Anthony Nalli has become irritating in his narrations reading from a script while trying to make nearly every word sound exciting! What happened to the other presenters?
I purchased this as a gift for my nephew.  He loves it.  I bought all of the seasons and he watched them all immediately and has rewatched them since.
I hate that it is the last season because I enjoyed every moment and learned so much, I have already started reviewing the entire collection again and still it's enjoyable.
